attributes.action: Start petition asking for help for UK driving licences to be swapped in spain
attributes.additional_details: We hope to bear pressure on Spanish government to conclude the ongoing discussions  by asking uk MPS to help
attributes.background:
Considerable  hardship for resident British people in spain who cannot use their British licence to drive for the last 5 months,unlike other EU countries who have allowed the licence to be swapped for a local licence, ie Spanish
 licence as per pre brexit

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616713
